meta.name: Research Plan Checker
meta.description: Builds a quick research plan and self-checks coverage and ethics.

data.label: Draft Plan
data.prompt: Create a lean research plan: goals, 3 hypotheses, methods, participants, timeline, success signals.

data.label: Coverage Audit
data.prompt: Audit the plan: check for bias/ethics, missing signals, and feasibility. Return fixes and an overall confidence (low/med/high).

data.label: Final Plan
data.prompt: Apply the audit feedback and output a tightened plan under 200 words.
